data.Name: Nabla Analytics
data.Tagline: Data Analytics for the Energy Industry.
data.About:
Whether you are taking your initial steps to become a data-driven organisation, or you want to refine your current infrastructure, Nabla Analytics provides you with bespoke consulting services to elevate your business. Below we highlight our key focus areas.

Nabla Analytics was founded in Gothenburg, Sweden in 2019 to meet the growing demand for Data Analytics in the Energy Industry. Nabla Analytics’ founder Warren O’Neill has worked as an analyst in European Energy Markets for the last 5 years in both Ireland and Germany.
